description.@en: The long hours spent with a quill has trained me how to write in another’s hand.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You reduce the time required to use Counterfeit Tests by half (suggestions include faking a seal, writing propaganda, determining false documentation, etc.). In addition, you automatically succeed at all Skill Tests to decipher counterfeited writing.
